question: What is the Wing Visa Credit Infinite card
answer: The Wing Visa Credit Infinite is a premium, metal-designed credit card offering exclusive global privileges, including unlimited lounge access, up to $1,000,000 in travel insurance, a customizable credit line, and luxurious lifestyle services tailored for high-net-worth individuals.

question: What are feature and benefit of Wing Visa Credit Infinite
keyword: feature benefit wing visa credit infinite

Wing Visa Credit Infirnite offer many fe: Crafted from pure metal, our Visa Infinite Credit Card exudes elegance and exclusivity
Numberless Security: Experience the pinnacle of security with our numberless design, ensuring your financial transactions are guarded at all times
Tailor Made Credit Line: Your credit, your way. Enjoy a credit line customized to meet your unique financial needs
Global Payment Convenience: Make secure payments worldwide, both in-store through POS and online, wherever VISA is accepted
Cash Advances: Unlock the potential of your credit limit with cash advances up to 50% at ATMs globally, subject to daily and transaction limits
Interest-Free Grace Period: Spend now, pay later with up to 55 days of interest-free grace
Real time Transaction Alerts: Stay informed with instant alerts for every transaction made using your Visa Infinite Credit Card
Wing Bank App: Seamlessly manage your card and make payments through our secure and user-friendly Wing Bank app
Supplementary Cards: Extend the luxury to your family with the option to add up to 5 supplementary cards
24/7 Customer Service: Our dedicated customer service team is at your disposal around the clock, ensuring your queries are addressed promptly
Exclusive Promotions: Enjoy exciting promotions globally through VISA-participating merchant programs
Cash Back Rewards: Earn up to 1.1% cash back on every card purchase, with a maximum monthly reward of $500
Unlimited Lounge Access: Experience unparalleled luxury with unlimited access to DragonPass’s network Lounges worldwide and Wing Bank’s premier banking lounges at all branches
Free Travel Insurance: Travel with confidence, knowing you're covered with free travel insurance up to $1,000,000

question: What is the annual fee for the Wing Visa Credit Infinite card
keyword: annual fee wing visa credit infinite
answer: The annual fee for the Wing Visa Credit Infinite card is USD 999 for the primary cardholder and USD 499 per supplementary card.

question: How much cashback can I earn with the Wing Visa Credit Infinite card
keyword: cashback earn wing visa credit infinite
answer: With the Wing Visa Credit Infinite card, you can earn up to 1.1% cashback on purchases, capped at USD 500 per month.

question: What kind of travel insurance is included with the Wing Visa Credit Infinite card
keyword: tranvwl insurance wing visa credit infinite
answer: The Wing Visa Credit Infinite card offers free travel insurance coverage of up to USD 1,000,000.

question: Does the Wing Visa Credit Infinite card provide airport lounge access
keyword: airport lounge access wing visa credit infinite
answer: Wing Visa Credit Infinite card provides unlimited access to global lounges through DragonPass, as well as Wing Bank’s premier banking lounges.

question: What is the credit line policy for the Wing Visa Credit Infinite card
keyword: credit line policy wing visa credit infinite
answer: The Wing Visa Credit Infinite card offers a tailor-made credit line, customized based on your financial profile and needs.

question: What is the maximum daily cash advance limit on the Wing Visa Credit Infinite card
keyword: maximum daily cash advance limit wing visa credit infinite
answer: You can withdraw up to USD 10,000 per day via ATM using your Wing Visa Credit Infinite card.

question: How many supplementary cards can I get with the Wing Visa Credit Infinite card
keyword: supplementary card wing visa credit infinite
answer: You can add up to 5 supplementary cards with your Wing Visa Credit Infinite card account.

keyword: security features wing visa credit infinite
answer: The Wing Visa Credit Infinite card includes a numberless design, contactless chip technology, and OTP verification for online payments.

question: What is the purchase interest rate on the Wing Visa Credit Infinite card
answer: With Wing Visa Credit Infinite are subject to charge a 1.5% monthly interest rate if not paid during the grace period.

question: What are the cash advance fees for the Wing Visa Credit Infinite card

answer: The Wing Visa Credit Infinite card charges 2% or a minimum of USD 5 per cash advance transaction.

question: How can I manage my Wing Visa Credit Infinite card account
answer: Wing Visa Credit Infinite card can be manage through the Wing Bank app, which offers secure and real-time transaction alerts.

question: Does the Wing Visa Credit Infinite card include a concierge service

answer: Wing Visa Credit Infinite card offers 24/7 Visa Concierge service for travel bookings, dining reservations, and personalized assistance.

question: What should I do if I need to replace my Wing Visa Credit Infinite card
answer: Card replacement for the Wing Visa Credit Infinite card costs USD 599 per card.
